p: Multiple comparisons of mean+SEM were carried out by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) for thermally-induced pain model and xylene-induced ear oedema model while two-way ANOVA was used for egg-albumin-induced right hind paw oedema and acetic acid-induced writhing models followed by Bonferroni and Tukeyâ€™s multiple comparisons tests using Graph pad prism software package 8.0 operated on Windows 10 platform. Any probability level of less than 5% was considered significant.
